channel.title: FlyMine News
channel.description: An integrated database for Drosophila and Anopheles genomics.

item.title: FlyMine 8.0 Released
item.description: FlyMine 8.0 is now available. See release notes. FlyMine 8.0 includes three new data sets: Tiffin (predicted regulatory motifs), anoEST (A. gambiae EST clusters) and predicted 3-D protein structures for A. gambiae domains. A new type of constraint is used in template queries which now allows you to enter any identifier or symbol.

item.title: Job opportunities
item.description: We are recruiting two Senior Software Developers to work on the NIH funded modENCODE project. InterMine (the software behind FlyMine) will be used as a major part of the Data Coordination Centre of modENCODE. See more information.

item.title: FlyMine workshop
item.description: We are running a half day workshop on using FlyMine in Cambridge UK on June 20th. This is part of a joint workshop with FlyBase, half a day will be devoted to each. The workshop is free of charge, for more information and to sign up see here.

item.title: InterMine and modENCODE
item.description: InterMine will be used as a major component of the Data Coordination Centre for the $57m modENCODE project; G. Micklem has been awarded two posts for four years to apply the technology developed in the FlyMine project to the dissemination of data produced as part of the $57m US NIH modENCODE project (www.modencode.org). This programme will generate an unprecedented amount of data about functional elements in the genomes of the fruit fly Drosophila melanogaster and the nematode Caenorhabditis elegans.

item.title: FlyMine 7.1 Released
item.description: FlyMine 7.1 is now available. See release notes. FlyMine 7.1 includes a number of new user interface features. Results of queries can be ordered by a selected column and results tables have a new summary button which brings up statistics on the values in that column. Many template queries now have more descriptive column titles in results tables.

item.title: FlyMine 7.0 Released
item.description: FlyMine 7.0 is now available. See release notes. FlyMine 7.0 updates the D. melanogaster genome to version 5.1. All dependent data sources have been remapped. New viewers have been added to the gene bag details pages.

item.title: FlyMine 6.1 Released
item.description: FlyMine 6.1 is now available. See release notes. FlyMine 6.1 contains a major overhaul of the way FlyMine handles bags. A sophisticated bag uplaod page has been added and the contents of bags can be analysed on bag details pages.

item.title: Service interruption
item.description: We apologise for the service interruption today. Our server suffered a hardware failure at 4pm GMT, which has now been fixed.

item.title: FlyMine 6.0 Released
item.description: FlyMine 6.0 is now available. See release notes. FlyMine 6.0 adds data from seven Dropsophila RNAi screens from the DRSC, microarray-based gene expression data from FlyAtlas and Transcriptional cis-regulatory modules (CRMs) from REDfly. Template queries have a new, succinct naming scheme and identifiers/names in results tables are now links to object details pages. Other data sources have been updated/added and there are numerous interface improvements.

item.title: FlyMine Workshop
item.description: A joint FlyMine/FlyBase workshop will held on Thursday 23rd November in the Department of Genetics, Cambridge University. For more information and booking please see workshop information.

item.title: FlyMine is hiring
item.description: FlyMine is looking for an experineced biologist to join the team on part-time maternity cover. More Information.

item.title: New FlyMine Tutorials
item.description: The FlyMine tutorials have now been updated. Tutorials on using the QueryBuilder, working with bags and building your own templates have been added.

item.title: FlyMine 5.0 Released
item.description: FlyMine 5.0 is now available. See release notes. FlyMine 5.0 adds genome annotation for D. pseudoobscura (release 2.0 from FlyBase) and A. mellifera (release 2.0 from Ensembl) with InParanoid orthologues to the other genomes in FlyMine. Also added are InParanoid orthologues to many other species and GO annotation for some of them. Interface improvements include the ability for users to tag favourite templates and to change their password.

item.title: FlyBase links to FlyMine
item.description: FlyBase gene reports now include a link directly to FlyMine gene details pages.

item.title: FlyMine 4.0 Released
item.description: FlyMine 4.0 is now available. See release notes.

item.title: Cambridge University Network Maintenance
item.description: FlyMine will be unavailable from approximately 9am until 5pm GMT on Thursday 29th December 2005 due to network maintenance.

item.title: FlyMine 3.1 Released
item.description: FlyMine 3.1 is now available. See release notes.

item.title: FlyMine 3.0 Released
item.description: FlyMine 3.0 is now available. See release notes.

item.title: FlyMine 2.1 Released
item.description: FlyMine 2.1 is now available. See release notes.

item.description: FlyMine 2.0 is now available.

item.title: FlyMine 1.1 Released
